rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance area, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning with the North-East direction.
Spacious living area connected to the courtyard and dining space, ensuring natural light and ventilation as per Kerala traditional design.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a view of the courtyard; designed for communal gatherings following Vastu guidelines.
Functional space with proper ventilation and water supply, placed in an auspicious direction (South-East) according to Vastu principles.
A well-ventilated guest room adjacent to the living area, with a small balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Spacious master bedroom ensuring privacy and serenity; includes an ensuite bathroom. Placed in the North-West quadrant as per Vastu advice for better energy flow.
Primary bathroom facility located near the living area, designed with proper drainage and ventilation.
Small storage space for household items; strategically placed to maintain energy balance.

openings.description: Complying with Vastu principles, the main door is placed in a secure and auspicious direction.
Large window for ample natural light and ventilation; aligned with traditional Kerala architecture.
A door facilitating smooth movement between guest bedroom and main corridor.

additional_features.description: An outdoor swimming pool designed to provide relaxation while adhering to Vastu guidelines by balancing water elements.
Dedicated parking space for two cars, with easy access to the main entrance and in compliance with local building norms.
Open courtyard providing natural ventilation, light, and a communal gathering space; designed in line with traditional Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and ample space for family members; placed in the North-East quadrant.
Complementing Bedroom 1 with similar dimensions; aligned with Vastu principles by being oriented towards the auspicious directions.
A quiet space for study or work, located away from high-traffic areas and in a direction that encourages concentration as per Vastu guidelines.
Provides outdoor seating area with views of the surrounding landscape; enhances natural light and air circulation.

openings.description: Ensures natural ventilation and sunlight, following traditional Kerala design elements.
Provides access to the study room; designed with Vastu-compliant positioning.
